name: BACARDĺ Cuatro Smash
preparation:
You won’t find many spirits as versatile as BACARDĺ Añejo Cuatro rum. You can sip it straight or enjoy it in a refreshing cocktail, like the BACARDĺ Cuatro Smash. Grab some grapefruit juice and St-Germain to enjoy premium rum in a whole new way.

Add all the ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake.

Strain into a highball glass over fresh ice.

Top with the tonic water.

Garnish with a grapefruit peel and mint sprig.
